author: tomdz
msg: Major overhaul of the xdoclet ojb module with core completely reworked for more flexibility
Additional changes to the xdoclet ojb module:
- the module now performs more checks
- new option 'checks' in main task for controlling the amount of checks performed
- autoincrement setting has different options now: none | ojb | database

author: arminw
msg: set batch mode false by default in constructor of ConnectionManager, otherwise
batch-mode was true the first time ConnectionManager was used (if batch-mode is enabled in
repository file and DB supports batch update) regardsless user do a CM.setBatchMode(true) call.
This could leed in unexpected behaviour.
See test PersistenceBrokerTest#testUncommittedRead, new added test for fix

author: olegnitz
msg: Additional restriction on the reordering of statements
